function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher susceptibility to COVID-19 among immigrants","Impact":"Increased hospital admissions and deaths among immigrant groups","Mitigation":"Improve health literacy and access to healthcare for immigrant communities","Technologies":"Targeted communication strategies, outreach programs","People":"Immigrant communities, native-born children of immigrants","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Disparities in vaccination rates among immigrant groups","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and severity in immigrant populations","Mitigation":"Enhance vaccination outreach and access for immigrant communities","Technologies":"Vaccination campaigns, mobile vaccination clinics","People":"Immigrant communities, public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in COVID-19 risk and mortality among immigrant groups based on region of origin","Impact":"Higher relative risk of dying among certain immigrant groups","Mitigation":"Provide targeted healthcare interventions for at-risk immigrant populations","Technologies":"Cultural competency training for healthcare providers, multilingual healthcare services","People":"Immigrant communities from high-risk regions","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical professionals"}]}
